topic.title: P2P - How to share pictures
topic.body:
I saw many websites like file.pizza with rtc.
But is it possible to share one or make a galery picture only using magnet and torrent client ?
A tracker is still needed in that case, right ?

1_1EUyJtat7mbu5wMcR6nrJTPBBRons1mtMA.body:
I learned about ZeroNet few minutes ago, on an IT blog: korben dot info.
Last post was about ZeroPlay.
I am amazed by the community and how it works.
